column4: how to setup firefox so it view any broadcast streaming with VLC in the browser. I want to make that a default. anybody know?
how can I setup VLC to be the default player for my browser(firefox) as in if i click on a feed or streaming it opens it up with VLC
i'm on add-ons TAB now. there is no plugin "totem-mozilla"
both of those are packages you install/uninstall in synaptic
I just saw that both of them were installed. mozilla-plugin-vlc and mozilla-totem
try about:plugins in mozilla, it should see them automatically
also you, can I send to you a screenshot?
take your browser to http://fredrik.hubbe.net/plugger/test.html test some codecs
video in browsers is problematic sometimes... and maybe andi5 knows more about it than I
your website I clicked it. and when i clicked "Quicktime" Old codec. it shows the same as my screenshot, the (No video) in the middle like that
switching over from mplayer, a sec
it appears that vlc doesn't play quicktime, see http://www.videolan.org/vlc/features.html
erm, never mind, it is listed. But I get the same no video text
